definition: A body part located at the end of the arm, typically consisting of fingers and a palm, used for grasping, holding, and manipulating objects. It is commonly employed for activities such as writing, gesturing, and performing tasks requiring fine motor skills.

examples.german: Die Hand ist am Ende des Arms.
examples.english: The hand is at the end of the arm.

examples.german: Er legte seine Hand auf ihre Schulter.
examples.english: He placed his hand on her shoulder.
